title.rendered: What is a good apartment design? and know if it is good for you?

content.rendered:
Have you ever asked yourself these questions before making a purchase decision? For most people the location and price point are the key decisive factors when choosing a new home. However, the simplest of things that are overlooked become your toughest pain points while adjusting in a new home. So what really is a good apartment design?

An apartment that you purchase is set to become your home for the coming years. A place where you come back from work, shed off your troubles from the outside world and seek peace. Thus, it is important to figure out the small yet important features and amenities that will help you achieve the ultimate coziness that you’d yearn for.

Expansive inside and out

A fantastic entry that does not really reveal the true size of your entire house, be it small or large, leaving some room to create a mystery for first time visitors. A nice and wide bedroom, where the bed and closet does not occupy most of your space. Well-suited bathrooms that allow your guests to retain their impression of you. Most importantly a well-lit environment that allows enough natural light into your premises so that you are always part of the city you live in. Because like Louis Kahn said, “a room is not a room without natural light”.

Space for everyone, at every corner

Yet, do not get carried away to please your guests more than you would accommodate your family. The occupants should be the number one priority. If you are moving into a new house with kids, make sure they have that space to play some ball or catch. Edison Real Estate takes precise measures to make sure this happens. A wide rooftop or an on-ground play area ensures a lively environment for the little ones. If you’re moving in elderlies, do know that there always is a healthy circulation of fresh air. Let them enjoy a nice and cozy balcony from where they can experience the fast changing new world. High-speed elevators, and wheelchair ramps are few things to look out for.



Where the daily actions take place

Are you forgetting the main utility area? Yes, the kitchen itself! Keep a sharp eye on that space, you do not want a less than comfortable cook to prep your meals. The placement of it in the apartment design should be in balanced order so that the heat and kitchen functions do not bother the other rooms.


Take a deep dive into design thinking

You know there are beautiful looking apartments popping up every now and then where you are planning to set up your next home; but remember “all that shines are not gold”. Take the extra time to learn from the realtors their thought behind the design, and their vision to accommodate your needs. You might truly be able to picture the vision behind the architect’s purpose. Does the driveway to your parking space make sense for your cherished car? Is the communal space befitting to cater to your need to host a warm get together with your loved ones? Can the overall styling of the apartment stand the test of time?

The design concept of Edison Real Estate’s each project in Bashundhara R/A, like EDISON TITANIA entails the ease of living for its occupants with well-planned circulation and endless facilities like an infinite edged swimming pool, active gymnasium, playing space for children along with a walking track to keep you healthy; also featuring with modern amenities designed with nature in center. All of Edison Real Estate’s projects are developed on own their lands so that residents can enjoy complete freedom when utilizing all the modern amenities of the projects and have equal equity of the property. This unique approach by EDISON also ensure timely completion of the projects hence you have to worry less about timely handover. Quality materials of top notched brands have been used with great functionality of products. They also provide inclusive green areas and landscaping spaces which are free of cost    


Bashundhara R/A, the new upstate of capital, is the ideal place for introducing new community style living with an exclusive connectivity.


EDISON DESDEMONA, with Step-Garden and Climatic Privacy Shading in the rooftop is going to be an iconic example of such. Because it’s not like you’d be getting yourself a new home every other year. So when you find all these little things touching your heart, you know it’s good for you. And truly, Home is where the heart is, and when you find something close to your heart, you find true happiness.
